title: Kozhikode
summary: Kozhikode ([koːɻikːoːʈ] (listen)), also known in English as Calicut, is an Indian city and the second-largest metropolitan city in the State of Kerala. It is also the 19th largest in the country with a population of two million according to the 2011 census.[8] Kozhikode is classified as a Tier 2 city by the Government of India.[9]
